subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Although the Islanders had not lost in regulation in their past eight games and needed a victory much more than the Devils, they failed to score against Martin Brodeur, who earned his 10th shutout of the season.
snippet: Although the Islanders had not lost in regulation in their past eight games and needed a victory much more than the Devils, they failed to score against Martin Brodeur, who earned his 10th shutout of the season.
